trans-unit.source: Binds a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> (or another <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation).
trans-unit.target: Associa um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> (ou outro <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>implementação).</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: A MouseBinding associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Associa um MouseBinding um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>implementação.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is the primary implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>é a implementação do principal a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>interface para o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand></xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: In general, when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is executed, the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>é executada, o comando é invocado, embora o comportamento do comando é ainda mais deve influenciado pelos comandos específicos fatores, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre commanding, consulte o [descrição geral do Commanding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When defining a MouseBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir um MouseBinding no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], existem duas formas para especificar <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a MouseBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the MouseBinding element, which enables a syntax to specify mouse actions and modifiers as a single string; for example, "CTRL+LeftClick".
trans-unit.target: A forma primeiro para estabelecer um MouseBinding no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] consiste em definir a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>atributo do elemento MouseBinding, que permite uma sintaxe especificar as ações do rato e modificadores como uma cadeia única; por exemplo, "CTRL + LeftClick".</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> attribute of the MouseBinding element.
trans-unit.target: A segunda forma consiste em definir a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>atributo do elemento MouseBinding.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: Ambas as direções de definição de <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>são equivalentes e modificar o mesmo objeto subjacente, mas pode haver um conflito se ambas as são utilizados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are both set, the gesture is invalid.
trans-unit.target: No caso quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>atributos estão ambos definidos, o gesto é inválido.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], even if you do not specify modifiers; this avoids ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, é recomendado que utilize apenas o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>atributo de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], mesmo se não especificar modificadores; Isto evita a ambiguidade, fornece a sintaxe mais simplificada e fornece a representação mais simples para serialização.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: A MouseBinding can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Um MouseBinding pode ser definido um objeto específico ou o nível de classe ao registar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>na <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most typical way to define a MouseBinding is within the control template, setting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more MouseBinding or <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: A forma mais comum para definir um MouseBinding está dentro do modelo de controlo, definir o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>propriedade no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] por declarar um ou mais MouseBinding ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>elementos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref> class, using the specified command and mouse gesture.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref> classe, através do gesto do comando e o rato especificado.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the gesture.
trans-unit.target: O comando associado o gesto.

trans-unit.source: The gesture associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: O gesto associado ao comando.

trans-unit.source: Copies the base (non-animated) values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia os base (não animada) os valores das propriedades do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a clonagem.

trans-unit.source: Copies the current values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia os valores atuais das propriedades do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a clonagem.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: O novo objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gesture associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o gesto associado a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> with or without a set of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>é um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>com ou sem um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to have a modifier key associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>não precisa de ter uma chave de modificador associada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The gesture.
trans-unit.target: O gesto.

trans-unit.source: Gesture is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gesto está definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates the instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> by using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: Cria a instância de um clone congelado de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> utilizando valores de propriedade base (não animada).

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a clonagem.

trans-unit.source: Creates the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone congelado de especificado a instância atual <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto tem propriedades de dependência animado, os respetivos valores animados atuais são copiados.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a clonagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to be associated with a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>não precisa de estar associado uma chave de modificador.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: So a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> by itself, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>, can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>por si só, como <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>, pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> válido</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>

trans-unit.source: The mouse action.
trans-unit.target: A ação de rato.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
